Misto:
Welcome! Why are you here? However, let me guess. Surely you want to pass the test to become even stronger!
This Mithril Mine is very ancient. Nobody has been working in it for a long time. Rumor has it that a terrible monster has appeared here.
 The path to the depths of the Mine is very long and tiring, so I will immediately transfer you to a safe place in its depths. Don’t worry, I won’t take any money. Hehe ...
